评论概述: Never Had A White Vest Pants Set Before
评论详情: When you are a messy like me you avoid white because you are a magnet for spills, smudges, and whatever rubs off from getting out of your car and resting too close to a wall. Having said that, I fell in love with ScotchGuard that somewhat shields clothes from stains and collecting smudges that won't come out. With this stuff I took on this vest and pants. They fit well, have great stitching and aren't too thick a fabric to make them sweaty. I may not pour my ice cream on it but you may want to pre-treat your light colored fabrics too if you are a messy like me!
The white vest and pants are nice bright white—and it matches other Wehilion-tagged clothes. See my video for more!

评论概述: Budget 2-piece set for a decent look
评论详情: I'm in a phase where I need to have a collection of various suit pieces in multiple colors. Not all of them need to be name-brand, tailored-fitted pieces, but they need to look decent enough for work events. The WOMS 2-piece vest and pants fit the bill fairly well. There is a bit of sheen to the fabric, so be aware. This would be great for event staff (I was previously a traveling casino manager and this would have been perfect). Size-wise, it fits as expected based on the chart measurements. At 5' 7" and weighing around 150 lbs, I typically wear size 30 pants for a close fit and size 32 for a loose comfortable fit. So I was torn between the XS (for my waist size) and S (for my chest size). I ignored the M by their graph chart. I went with the S to better accommodate my chest and for the slightly looser overall fit and I'm glad I did. It's comfortable and I retain range of motion. Don't forget your size will increase after eating too. The pants are quite spacious but they stay up well enough since I'm wearing a belt. Overall, I would recommend this as a decent 2-piece set, be it for event staff or light social/work events where you just need to look decent.
I ordered for my son 10 yrs old who is husky and it fits well. I had to cut and hem the pants because they were too long of course . Overall nice two piece slim fit.
The suit looks good but it's big. Amazon recommended XL. I had to send it back for a large.

This vest and pant suit is well made and has nice quality material. My son is 5'6" /125lbs and I ordered the XS. Some alterations will have to be made but nothing over the top. It doesn't look slim fit on him, looks more like regular fit.

评论概述: Very Nice Vest, Pants, Tie Combo for the Price
评论详情: This is one of the best vest, pants, tie combinations I've come across.  The colors match and the material of the vest and pants appears to be of high quality.  The tie compliments both and all 3 can easily be worn with any solid colored dress shirt.  I personally think white or gray make this outfit complete.In terms of fit, everything fits well without being uncomfortable or being too loose.  The size chart on the product page helps a lot in getting the right size for your overall body type and physique.  For reference, I'm 6'0" and 170lbs athletic build and chose size Large.Overall, Navy Blue is a winner with this 3-piece combo.
